text: János Göröcs (8 May 1939 – 23 February 2020) was a Hungarian footballer. He played as a midfielder. Göröcs was born in Gánt. He played club football for Újpesti Dózsa and Tatabányai Bányász. He played 62 games and scored 19 goals for the Hungary national team. He played in the bronze medal winning national team at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He also played for his country at the 1962 FIFA World Cup. He later coached Újpest. Göröcs died in Budapest on 23 February 2020 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *János Göröcs at Sports-Reference.com Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Hungarian football managers Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: János Göröcs
